properties.name: jwt.secrety-key
properties.description: This is the secret key used to encrypt user authentication tokens.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-time
properties.description: This value defines the expiration time assigned to tokens. After this period has elapsed since their generation, the tokens will no longer be valid in the system.

properties.name: api.base-path
properties.description: This property sets the base path for all API endpoints in the application.
